channel.title: Battlescape client connection
channel.description:
Alright, I tried to connect to the battlescape server that I recently downloaded. I have edited the connection port on the server. I have already tried logging in with a silabsoft client to make sure that it wasn't the server.
I have went and changed the 127.0.0.1 ip in the client but it still wont connect to the server??? Also yes I have portforwarded correctly..

item.title: Battlescape client connection
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Alright, I tried to connect to the battlescape server that I recently downloaded.
I have edited the connection port on the server.
I have already tried logging in with a silabsoft client to make sure that it wasn’t the server.

I have went and changed the 127.0.0.1 ip in the client but it still wont connect to the server???
Also yes I have portforwarded correctly…

Read full topic
